title: Wedding Belle Blues: Part 1
description: Lane MacKenzie, a sensible, aspiring newspaper writer living in New York City, returns to her hometown of Savannah, Georgia for the wedding of her best friend Reese Burton, a wealthy, trusting, virginal, but very naive, Southern belle, to Travis Peterson, a wealthy bank employees who is secretly embezzling funds from the local bank. Lane and Reese's best friend, the scheming and amoral Peyton Richards, the daughter of the Burton housekeeper, plans to her her seductive influence on Travis to steal Lane's life savings.

title: Wedding Belle Blues: Part 2
description: Following Travis' death, Peyton becomes worried that she may have killed him after hitting him on the head with a liquor bottle. But she is unaware that her mother, Lucile, is the real culprit to prevent him from revealing that Lucille has an illicit affair with Reese's powerful father, Edward... and that Peyton is in fact Edward's illegitimately daughter.

title: The Truth, the Whole Truth and Nothing But the Truth
Diary of a Mad Rich Wife
Get Me to the Church on Time
The Gal to Marry Dear Old Dad
